scripts.start: npm run docker:dev:start && cd server && sleep 30 && go build -o ./server && ./server
scripts.docker:volumes:reset: cd docker/polar/ && rm -rf volumes && tar -xvf volumes.tgz && rm -rf data/rskj/database
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:dev:start && npm run docker:connect
scripts.docker:dev:start: docker compose -f docker/polar/docker-compose-polar.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-rsk.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-boltz.yml up -d
scripts.docker:dev:stop: docker compose -f docker/polar/docker-compose-polar.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-rsk.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-boltz.yml down
